name: elm-in-the-spring
description: The website for Elm in the Spring 2019

scripts.build:watch: npm run build && chokidar './src' -c 'npm run build'
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o public/ --watch --recursive
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev: npm run build:watch & npm run watch:css & npm run serve

author: Ryan Haskell-Glatz
